name: Odyns Rikas
description:
Welcome to Odyns Rikas! Colonise your own little island in the viking age.

This is a university team project game.

Team

  • Audio - Malte Greve
  • Audio - Jaspar Naeve
  • Programming - Christopher Grimm
  • Programming - Tim
  • Programming - Timo
  • Art - Lara Teegen
  • Art - Pascal
  • Art - Bastian Hohlweck
